group_1.textRight: But that's why I really want to ask...
Would you come and have a Christmas party@with all of us?
I think...it would be really sad if you kept@on hating Christmas like this.
After all, you spent it with your mom and@dad, so...
It's a day full of precious memories, right?
It's that kind of day... One full of very@important memories...
I want to turn it into that kind of day@for Sana, too...
If you spend that time with us, and we make@lots of fun memories together...
Then, from now on, whenever you think about@Christmas, you'll remember us.
And maybe then you'll associate it with@happiness, and feel glad...
I know that my memories are what inspire me@to give it my all...
In fact, it's because of my memories of Ui...
That I can keep pushing ahead in@Kamihama.
So...
Let's do it together. Let's all make fun@Christmas memories, with everyone...
Then we can keep moving forward, while@holding that memory in our hearts...
How about it, Felicia? Sana?

group_1.textLeft: Damn! I guess you leave me with no choice...
You said there'd be grub, yeah? I'm in.

group_1.textRight: Felicia!
D-decorations!
We still haven't bought anything to decorate@the house with!
We should go do that now!

group_1.textLeft: Sounds like a drag, [chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100501:motion_200][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]but, ugh, whatever!@I'll go!

group_1.textRight: I-Iroha, would you like to come with us?
Sana!
I'd love to! Let's all go together!

group_1.narration: Now everyone is coming to the party!
And once the decorations are purchased,@all the preparations will be complete!
Which means there's just one thing left...
